snippet: The experience of sheltering Palestinian refugees has made the Lebanese government wary of any housing for those fleeing Syria’s war that seems too permanent.
abstract: Experience of sheltering Palestinian refugees has made Lebanon wary of creating housing for refugees fleeing Syria’s war that seems too permanent; country has so far rejected establishment of any refugee camp, although hundreds of thousands of refugees along with many Syrians already living there make up quarter of population.
lead_paragraph: The experience of sheltering Palestinian refugees has made the Lebanese government wary of any housing for those fleeing Syria’s war that seems too permanent.

headline.main: Lebanon Worries That Housing Will Make Syrian Refugees Stay
headline.print_headline: Lebanon Worries That Housing Will Make Syrian Refugees Stay

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
